Tell me what you need me to do.
ESP.TRADUIT: Dime que necesitas que haga.

ESP.ORIGINAL: ttbMQ11Fight2Wound1aiii
Thank you... I...
ESP.TRADUIT: Gracias. Yo...

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, shit... don't let me...
ESP.TRADUIT: Oh, mierda... no me dejes...

ESP.ORIGINAL: SetEssential ttbAmanda 0 ttbamandaref.kill enableplayercontrols if player.hasperk ttbPerkKeepsake showmessage ttbOQ01MessageKeepsakeNotification endif
I'll stop the. I swear it.
ESP.TRADUIT: Les detendré. Lo juro.

ESP.ORIGINAL: ttbMQ11AmandaWounded
Wait - hold on!
ESP.TRADUIT: Espera ¡Un momento!

ESP.ORIGINAL: ttbMQ04Freed
Daddy! I can't believe... I'm just so glad you're okay.
ESP.TRADUIT: ¡Papá! No puedo creer... me alegro de que estés bien.

ESP.ORIGINAL: ttbamandaRef.removescriptpackage ttbmq04talktodad
ttbMQ09FoundAmanda
Oh, thank God!
ESP.TRADUIT: ¡Gracias a Dios!

ESP.ORIGINAL: look Player
SetObjectiveCompleted TTBFamilyReunion 10 1 set TTBFamilyReunion.AmandaInCell to 2 set TTBDialogue.AmandaFollowing to 1 ttbAmandaRef.evp
ttbMS12Tenpenny1
Everyone sure does seem happy here.
ESP.TRADUIT: Todos parecen bastante felices aquí.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do you think... Do you think they'd let us stay?
ESP.TRADUIT: Crees... ¿crees que nos dejarán quedarnos?

ESP.ORIGINAL: I mean, just from time to time...
ESP.TRADUIT: Es decir, aunque sea de vez en cuando...

ESP.ORIGINAL: I think it's perfect.
ESP.TRADUIT: A mí me parece perfecto.

ESP.ORIGINAL: ttbMS12Tenpenny2
It's funny: when the world is no longer civilized, civilization suddenly seems out of place.
ESP.TRADUIT: Es curioso. Cuando el mundo ya no es civilizado, la civilización es lo que parece fuera de lugar.

ESP.ORIGINAL: So what are you planning to do about the ghoul issue?
ESP.TRADUIT: ¿Y qué planeas hacer con esto de los necrófagos?

ESP.ORIGINAL: "Eerie" to say the least.
ESP.TRADUIT: "Extraño" me parece poco.

ESP.ORIGINAL: ttbMS12Tenpenny3
So what are you planning to do about the ghoul issue?
ESP.TRADUIT: ¿Y qué planeas hacer con esto de los necrófagos?

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's pompous, is what it is.
ESP.TRADUIT: A mí me parece pomposo.

ESP.ORIGINAL: ttbMS12Tenpenny1a
It would be nice to sleep in a CLEAN bed every now and then.
ESP.TRADUIT: Estaría bien dormir en una cama LIMPIA de vez en cuando.

ESP.ORIGINAL: So what are you planning to do about the ghoul issue?
ESP.TRADUIT: ¿Y qué planeas hacer con esto de los necrófagos?

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm sure we can work something out.
ESP.TRADUIT: Creo que podremos arreglarlo.

ESP.ORIGINAL: ttbMS12Tenpenny1b
You're probably right.
ESP.TRADUIT: Seguramente tengas razón.

ESP.ORIGINAL: So what are you planning to do about the ghoul issue?
ESP.TRADUIT: ¿Y qué planeas hacer con esto de los necrófagos?

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't think we're they're type.
ESP.TRADUIT: No creo que encajemos con esta gente.

ESP.ORIGINAL: ttbMS12Tenpenny3a
You really have no problem just killing them like that?
ESP.TRADUIT: ¿En serio no tienes ningún problema en matarlos sin más?

ESP.ORIGINAL: The residents want them gone: they're gone.
ESP.TRADUIT: Los residentes quieren que desaparezcan, y desaparecerán.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Shoot 'em all and get God sort 'em out - amen.
ESP.TRADUIT: Una bala en cada cabeza y que Dios separe a los suyos. Amén.

ESP.ORIGINAL: The residents want them gone: they're gone.
ESP.TRADUIT: Los residentes quieren que desaparezcan, y desaparecerán.

ESP.ORIGINAL: ttbMS12Tenpenny3b
I'm glad we're on the same page: there's got to be a peaceful resolution to all this...
ESP.TRADUIT: Me alegro de que pensemos lo mismo. Tiene que haber una forma pacífica de solucionar esto...

ESP.ORIGINAL: The ghouls have a right to this place as much as anyone.
ESP.TRADUIT: Los necrófagos tienen tanto derecho a disfrutar de este lugar como cualquiera.

ESP.ORIGINAL: You sure about that? I mean, it's Tenpenny's property: shouldn't he be allowed to pick and choose who gets to stay?
ESP.TRADUIT: ¿Seguro? Quiero decir que esto es propiedad de Tenpenny. ¿No debería poder decidir quien se queda y quien se va?

ESP.ORIGINAL: The ghouls have a right to this place as much as anyone.
ESP.TRADUIT: Los necrófagos tienen tanto derecho a disfrutar de este lugar como cualquiera.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Bunch of fuckin' bigots, if you ask me.
ESP.TRADUIT: Una panda de fanáticos, en mi opinión.

ESP.ORIGINAL: We oughtta blow a hole in the wall or something, and just let the ghouls have free run of the place.
ESP.TRADUIT: Deberíamos hacer un agujero en el muro o algo así, y dejar que los necrófagos puedan campar a sus anchas por aquí.

ESP.ORIGINAL: The ghouls have a right to this place as much as anyone.
ESP.TRADUIT: Los necrófagos tienen tanto derecho a disfrutar de este lugar como cualquiera.

ESP.ORIGINAL: ttbMS12Tenpenny3c
You know I've got your back either way.
ESP.TRADUIT: Sabes que te cubro las espaldas igualmente.

ESP.ORIGINAL: I haven't decided yet.
ESP.TRADUIT: No lo he decidido aún.

ESP.ORIGINAL: ttbMS12Tenpenny3ai
Well, I can't say I like it, but I've got your back either way.
ESP.TRADUIT: No puedo decir que me guste, pero te cubro las espaldas igualmente.

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, I'm fine with it.
ESP.TRADUIT: No, me parece bien.

ESP.ORIGINAL: ttbMS12Tenpenny3aii
You know I've got your back either way.
ESP.TRADUIT: Sabes que te cubro las espaldas igualmente.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Maybe you're right. I'll give it some thought.
ESP.TRADUIT: Tal vez tengas razón. Me lo pensaré.

ESP.ORIGINAL: ttbMS12Tenpenny3bi
You know I've got your back either way.
ESP.TRADUIT: Sabes que te cubro las espaldas igualmente.

ESP.ORIGINAL: There aren't a lot of us left: we have an obligation to each other.
ESP.TRADUIT: No quedamos muchos. Tenemos el deber de cuidarnos los unos a los otros.

ESP.ORIGINAL: ttbMS12Tenpenny3bii
I'd say if the ghouls will leave it alone, let 'em be - but if they're planning something extreme, we've got to stop them.
You know I've got your back, either way.
ESP.TRADUIT: Sabes que te cubro las espaldas igualmente.

ESP.ORIGINAL: You've got a point. So what do we do?
ESP.TRADUIT: Tienes parte de razón. ¿Qué hacemos?

ESP.ORIGINAL: ttbMS03Moira1
She's a bit off, that one...
ESP.TRADUIT: Se le va un poco la olla a esta tía...

ESP.ORIGINAL: look MoiraBrownRef
ttbMS03Moira1a
We haven't got time to be running around the Wastes for some stupid little book.
ESP.TRADUIT: No tenemos tiempo de corretear por los Yermos por un estúpido folleto.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Not a bad idea.
ESP.TRADUIT: No es mala idea.

ESP.ORIGINAL: ttbMS03Moira1b
Alright, don't get your panties in a knot - it was just a suggestion.
ESP.TRADUIT: Vale, no te mosquees, solo era una sugerencia.

ESP.ORIGINAL: I said I'd do it: we're doing it.
ESP.TRADUIT: Dije que lo haría, y lo haremos.

ESP.ORIGINAL: ttbMS03Moira2
Okay, it was kinda cute at first...
ESP.TRADUIT: Vale, al principio era divertido...

ESP.ORIGINAL: ttbMS03Moira2a
You're not actually swallowing that tripe, are you?
ESP.TRADUIT: No te habrás tragado esa chorrada, ¿verdad?

ESP.ORIGINAL: This book could really help people, Amanda.
ESP.TRADUIT: Este libro podría ayudar a mucha gente, Amanda.

ESP.ORIGINAL: ttbMS03Moira2b
That's what I'm talking about. "Wasteland Survival Guide" my ass...
ESP.TRADUIT: A eso me refiero. "Guía de Supervivencia del Yermo"... una mierda.

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're right: fuck this nonsense.
ESP.TRADUIT: Tienes razón: que le jodan a esta parida.

ESP.ORIGINAL: ttbMS03Moira2ai
Believe me, trying is ALL she's doing.
ESP.TRADUIT: Creeme, intentarlo es LO ÚNICO que ella hace.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Whatever. Let's just get this over with.
ESP.TRADUIT: Da igual. Acabemos con esto.

ESP.ORIGINAL: At least she's TRYING to help.
ESP.TRADUIT: Al menos ella INTENTA ayudar.

ESP.ORIGINAL: ttbMS11Bomb
Nothing really left but to watch the world burn, is there?
ESP.TRADUIT: No queda más que ver el mundo arder, ¿verdad?

ESP.ORIGINAL: if ttbDialogue.MS11Bomb < 1 set ttbDialogue.MS11Bomb to 1 endif
I can't believe you actually went through with it! What were you thinking?!
ESP.TRADUIT: ¡No puedo creer que lo hicieras de verdad! ¡¿En qué estabas pensando?!

ESP.ORIGINAL: if ttbDialogue.MS11Bomb < 1 set ttbDialogue.MS11Bomb to 1 endif
ttbMS11Bomb1
Get in, scrape together whatever you can for yourself, and get out.
Something like that.
ESP.TRADUIT: Algo así.

ESP.ORIGINAL: I can't believe your selfishness! The world's tainted you, just like I was afraid it would.
ESP.TRADUIT: ¡No puedo creer lo egoista que eres! Este mundo te ha corrompido, tal y como temía.

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.rewardkarma -150
Uh... caps?
ESP.TRADUIT: Uh... ¿chapas?

ESP.ORIGINAL: ttbMS11Bomb2
There's just no point to any of it anymore. The human race...? We're never going to recover - not from this.
This isn't the "new world"... It's the downward slope.
What do you mean?
ESP.TRADUIT: ¿Qué quieres decir?

ESP.ORIGINAL: (sigh) I want to be mad at you... but I understand all too well where you're coming from.
ESP.TRADUIT: (suspiro) Quiero estar enfadada contigo... pero entiendo demasiado bien por lo que has pasado.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let's just hope this doesn't come back to bite us in the ass.
ESP.TRADUIT: Solo esperemos que no se vuelva en nuestra contra.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Just one more hole in the ground.
ESP.TRADUIT: Un agujero más en el suelo.

ESP.ORIGINAL: ttbMS11Bomb3
For WHOM exactly? This ridiculous old man, in his ivory tower?!
ESP.TRADUIT: ¿A QUIEN exáctamente? ¿A este anciano ridículo, en su torre de marfil?

ESP.ORIGINAL: I did them a favour.
ESP.TRADUIT: Les hice un favor.

ESP.ORIGINAL: ttbMS11Bomb3a
I can't believe your selfishness! The world's tainted you, just like I was afraid it would.
ESP.TRADUIT: ¡No puedo creer lo egoista que eres! Este mundo te ha corrompido, tal y como temía.

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.rewardkarma -150
He made a good pitch.
ESP.TRADUIT: Hizo una buena oferta.

ESP.ORIGINAL: ttbMS11Bomb3b
You really think those people are better off dead?!
ESP.TRADUIT: ¿¡En serio piensas que esa gente está mejor muerta?!

ESP.ORIGINAL: Not him - them.
ESP.TRADUIT: No a el, a ellos.

ESP.ORIGINAL: ttbMS11Bomb3bi
You don't get to make that decision for them.
ESP.TRADUIT: No puedes tomar esa decisión por ellos.

ESP.ORIGINAL: (sigh) It's done now - let's just hope it doesn't bite us in the ass.
ESP.TRADUIT: (suspiro) Ya está hecho... solo esperemos que no se vuelva en nuestra contra.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Look around: this isn't a life worth living.
ESP.TRADUIT: Mira alrededor: esta vida no vale la pena.

ESP.ORIGINAL: ttbMS11Bomb3bii
This point is exactly when we NEED to hold on to something like hope.
ESP.TRADUIT: A estas alturas es justo cuando NECESITAMOS aferrarnos a algo como la esperanza.

ESP.ORIGINAL: (sigh) I know it's not ideal - trust me, I know. But you'll see..
ESP.TRADUIT: (suspiro) se que no es ideal... confía en mí, lo sé. Pero ya lo verás...

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hope at this point is a delusion.
ESP.TRADUIT: La esperanza a estas alturas es una ilusión.

ESP.ORIGINAL: ttbMQ11Fight3Forgive1
Forget about all that.
ESP.TRADUIT: Olvida todo eso.

ESP.ORIGINAL: All that matters is you're back... and you're okay.
ESP.TRADUIT: Todo lo que importa es que has vuelto... y que estás bien.

ESP.ORIGINAL: If ttbDialogue.AmandaFollowing == 0 set ttbDialogue.AmandaFollowing to 1 endif
Amanda, I'm sorry about before...
ESP.TRADUIT: Amanda, lo siento por lo de antes...

ESP.ORIGINAL: ttbMQ11Fight3Forgive2
All that matters is you're back... and you're okay.
ESP.TRADUIT: Lo único que importa es que has vuelto... y que estás bien.

ESP.ORIGINAL: If ttbDialogue.AmandaFollowing == 0 set ttbDialogue.AmandaFollowing to 1 endif
You aren't still mad at me?
ttbMiscJoke1
I thought you could use a joke.
ESP.TRADUIT: Pensé que te vendría bien una broma.

ESP.ORIGINAL: "Knock knock"...?
ESP.TRADUIT: "Toc toc"...?

ESP.ORIGINAL: ttbMiscJoke1a
Botany...
ESP.TRADUIT: Ernesto...

ESP.ORIGINAL: Who's there?
ESP.TRADUIT: ¿Quién es?

ESP.ORIGINAL: Bought-any good digs lately? I'm getting sick of these clothes...
ESP.TRADUIT: El dueño de todo esto.

ESP.ORIGINAL: set ttbDialogue.MiscJoke to 1
Botany who?
ESP.TRADUIT: ¿Qué Ernesto?

ESP.ORIGINAL: ttbMiscJoke2
Knock-knock!
ESP.TRADUIT: ¡Toc toc!

ESP.ORIGINAL: Seriously?
ESP.TRADUIT: ...¿En serio?

ESP.ORIGINAL: ttbMiscJoke2a
Sez...
ESP.TRADUIT: Abogado...

ESP.ORIGINAL: Who's there?
ESP.TRADUIT: ¿Quién es?

ESP.ORIGINAL: Says me, that's who!
ESP.TRADUIT: El que tengo aquí colgado.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sez who?
ESP.TRADUIT: ¿Qué abogado?

ESP.ORIGINAL: ttbMiscJoke3
Oh, come on! Last one...
ESP.TRADUIT: ¡Oh, venga! El último...

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm not doing this.
ESP.TRADUIT: Paso de esto.

ESP.ORIGINAL: ttbMiscJoke3a
Yacht...
ESP.TRADUIT: Antúnez

ESP.ORIGINAL: Who's there?
ESP.TRADUIT: ¿Quién es?

ESP.ORIGINAL: Y'ought to know me by now!
ESP.TRADUIT: El que te la mete el domingo y te la saca el lunes.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yacht who?
ESP.TRADUIT: ¿Qué Antunez?

ESP.ORIGINAL: ttbMiscAmandaStay1
Let me know when you're ready to go.
ESP.TRADUIT: Avísame cuando quieras que nos marchemos.

ESP.ORIGINAL: set TTBDialogue.AmandaFollowing to 0 set ttbDialogue.AmandaWait to 1 ttbAmandaRef.evp SetObjectiveDisplayed TTBTiesThatBind 99 1
Just wait right here for now.
ESP.TRADUIT: Espérame aquí de momento.

ESP.ORIGINAL: ttbMiscAmandaStay2
I'll see you there.
ESP.TRADUIT: Nos veremos allí.

ESP.ORIGINAL: set TTBDialogue.AmandaFollowing to 0 set ttbDialogue.AmandaHome to 1 ttbAmandaRef.evp SetObjectiveDisplayed TTBTiesThatBind 99 1
I need you to head to Rivet City.
ESP.TRADUIT: Necesito que vayas a Rivet City

ESP.ORIGINAL: ttbMiscAmandaStay3
I'll see you there.
ESP.TRADUIT: Nos veremos allí.

ESP.ORIGINAL: set TTBDialogue.AmandaFollowing to 0 set ttbDialogue.AmandaHome to 2 ttbAmandaRef.evp SetObjectiveDisplayed TTBTiesThatBind 99 1
Wait for me at home.
ESP.TRADUIT: Espérame en casa.

ESP.ORIGINAL: ttbMiscAmandaStay4
I'll see you there.
ESP.TRADUIT: Nos veremos allí.

ESP.ORIGINAL: set TTBDialogue.AmandaFollowing to 0 set ttbDialogue.AmandaHome to 3 ttbAmandaRef.evp SetObjectiveDisplayed TTBTiesThatBind 99 1
Meet me at the old house.
ESP.TRADUIT: Nos vemos en la vieja cabaña.

ESP.ORIGINAL: ttbOQ01Negotiate1
Settle down there, squirt. What's to stop me from slappin' a collar on YOU right here an' now?
ESP.TRADUIT: Frena un poco, idiota. ¿Qué me impide colgarte un collar a TÍ ahora mismo?

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's she to you, anyway?
ESP.TRADUIT: ¿Qué es ella para tí, por cierto?

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let her go, you son of a bitch!
ESP.TRADUIT: ¡Suéltala, hijo de puta!

ESP.ORIGINAL: ttbOQ01Negotiate2
What's she to you, anyway?
ESP.TRADUIT: ¿Qué es ella para tí, por cierto?

ESP.ORIGINAL: How much?
ESP.TRADUIT: ¿Cuánto?

ESP.ORIGINAL: ttbOQ01Negotiate3
Alright then...
ESP.TRADUIT: Está bien...

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll be back.
ESP.TRADUIT: Volveré.

ESP.ORIGINAL: ttbOQ01Negotiate2a
Ha! Well, you know, my Daddy always said "family comes first" - so I bet you'd be willing to cough up 500 caps to see her free an' safe.
ESP.TRADUIT: ¡Je! Bueno, ya sabes, mi papá siempre dijo que "la familia es lo primero"... así que apuesto lo que sea a que podrás soltar 500 chapas para verla libre y a salvo.

ESP.ORIGINAL: set ttbDialogue.OQ01AmandaDeal to 5
She's my sister, asshole.
ESP.TRADUIT: Es mi hermana, gilipollas.

ESP.ORIGINAL: ttbOQ01Negotiate2b
Well, friends cost money, now don't they? 'Spose I could let 'er go fer... 200 caps.
ESP.TRADUIT: Bueno, los amigos valen dinero, ¿verdad? Supongo que podría dejarla ir por... 200 chapas.

ESP.ORIGINAL: set ttbDialogue.OQ01AmandaDeal to 2
She's a friend: that's all you need to know.
ESP.TRADUIT: Es una amiga: es todo lo que necesitas saber.

ESP.ORIGINAL: ttbOQ01Negotiate2c
Well shit, we all been there. Tell you what: a hundred caps an' she's all yers.
ESP.TRADUIT: Sí, conozco esa mierda. Mira, 100 chapas y es tuya.

ESP.ORIGINAL: set ttbDialogue.OQ01AmandaDeal to 1
Just a bitch who owe's me money. [karma]
ESP.TRADUIT: Es solo una zorra que me debe dinero. [karma]

ESP.ORIGINAL: ttbOQ01NegotiateKarma
Shit, sorry. I-I didn't realize. Here: take the key - with my pardons.
ESP.TRADUIT: Mierda, lo siento. Yo... no me había dado cuenta. Toma, aquí tienes la llave... y mis disculpas.

ESP.ORIGINAL: ttbCG04RaiderLeaderRef.removeitem ttbOQ01CollarKey 1 player.additem ttbOQ01CollarKey 1 player.additem ttbOQ01CellKey 1 set ttbDialogue.OQ01AmandaDeal to 99
Do you know who I AM?! [karma]
ESP.TRADUIT: ¡¿Pero es que no sabes QUIEN SOY?! [karma]

ESP.ORIGINAL: ttbOQ01NegotiatePay
Pleasure doin' business with ya, squirt.
ESP.TRADUIT: Un placer hacer negocios contigo, imbécil.

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.removeitem caps001 100 ttbCG04RaiderLeaderRef.additem caps001 100 ttbCG04RaiderLeaderRef.removeitem ttbOQ01CollarKey 1 player.additem ttbOQ01CollarKey 1 player.additem ttbOQ01CellKey 1 set ttbDialogue.OQ01AmandaDeal to 99
Here's your damn money.
ESP.TRADUIT: Aquí tienes tu maldito dinero.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Pleasure doin' business with ya, squirt.
ESP.TRADUIT: Un placer hacer negocios contigo, imbécil.

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.removeitem caps001 200 ttbCG04RaiderLeaderRef.additem caps001 200 ttbCG04RaiderLeaderRef.removeitem ttbOQ01CollarKey 1 player.additem ttbOQ01CollarKey 1 player.additem ttbOQ01CellKey 1 set ttbDialogue.OQ01AmandaDeal to 99
Here's your damn money.
ESP.TRADUIT: Aquí tienes tu maldito dinero.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Pleasure doin' business with ya, squirt.
ESP.TRADUIT: Un placer hacer negocios contigo, imbécil.

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.removeitem caps001 500 ttbCG04RaiderLeaderRef.additem caps001 500 ttbCG04RaiderLeaderRef.removeitem ttbOQ01CollarKey 1 player.additem ttbOQ01CollarKey 1 player.additem ttbOQ01CellKey 1 set ttbDialogue.OQ01AmandaDeal to 99
Here's your damn money.
ESP.TRADUIT: Aquí tienes tu maldito dinero.

ESP.ORIGINAL: ttbOQ01NegotiateRefuse
Alright then...
ESP.TRADUIT: Está bien...

ESP.ORIGINAL: No deal.
ESP.TRADUIT: No hay trato.

ESP.ORIGINAL: ttbOQ01NegotiateFunds
Well, ain't that a shame. Come on back when you got the caps.
ESP.TRADUIT: Una lástima. Vuelve cuando tengas las chapas.

ESP.ORIGINAL: I can't afford that.
ESP.TRADUIT: No me lo puedo permitir.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Family Reunion
ESP.TRADUIT: Reunión Familiar

ESP.TRADUIT: Recupera el cuerpo de papá

; everybody look at player CG02AmataREF.look player CG02ButchREF.look player CG02DadREF.look player CG02OldLadyPalmerREF.look player CG02OverseerREF.look player CG02PaulHannonREF.look player CG02Vault101Security04REF.look player CG02WallyMackREF.look player

CG02DadREF.IgnoreCrime 1 CG02JonasREF.IgnoreCrime 1 CG02AmataREF.IgnoreCrime 1 CG02StanleyREF.IgnoreCrime 1 CG02AndyREF.IgnoreCrime 1 CG02OverseerREF.IgnoreCrime 1 CG02OldLadyPalmerREF.IgnoreCrime 1 CG02Vault101Security02REF.IgnoreCrime 1 CG02Vault101Security04REF.IgnoreCrime 1 CG02ButchREF.IgnoreCrime 1 CG02PaulHannonREF.IgnoreCrime 1 CG02WallyMackREF.IgnoreCrime 1

; everybody look at player CG02AmataREF.look player ;CG02BeatriceREF.look player CG02ButchREF.look player CG02DadREF.look player CG02OldLadyPalmerREF.look player CG02OverseerREF.look player CG02PaulHannonREF.look player CG02Vault101Security04REF.look player ;CG02StevieMackREF.look player CG02WallyMackREF.look player ;CG02SusieMackREF.look player ;CG02ChristineKendallREF.look player

; everybody stop looking at player CG02AmataREF.stoplook CG02ButchREF.stoplook CG02DadREF.stoplook CG02OldLadyPalmerREF.stoplook CG02OverseerREF.stoplook CG02PaulHannonREF.stoplook CG02Vault101Security04REF.stoplook CG02WallyMackREF.stoplook

Dad finished talking to player

EnablePlayerControls 1 1 0 1 1 1; enable everything but fighting autosave setObjectiveDisplayed CG02 10 1 ; enable radio RadioVault101REF.enable CG02AmataREF.evp ; trigger pip-boy tutorial setstage CGTutorial 50 ; force radio update ForceRadioStationUpdate
; trigger Andy to start cutting cake CG02AndyREF.evp ; for now, end the scene here: CG02AndyREF.SayTo CG02AmataREF CG02CakeSpeech

Follow Dad to my surprise present.

stopquest CG02 CG02DadRef.disable CG02BeatriceREF.disable enablePlayerControls PipBoyRadioOff ; turn off radio if on ; if player still has skill book move it to CG04 if player.getItemCount BookSkillMelee > 0 CG04PlayerDresserREF.additem BookSkillMelee 1 endif player.removeallitems player.additem vaultsuit101 1 1 player.equipitem vaultsuit101 0 1 ; change player back to an adult player.AgeRace 1 ; do this last as it contains player.moveto: setstage CG03 0

ESP.ORIGINAL: SetLocationSpecificLoadScreensOnly 1 SetInCharGen 1 ; no leveling during chargen startQuest CG04 ; enable NPCs CG04ActorMarker.enable ; enable separately so can be disabled separately CG04TomHoldenREF.enable CG04MaryHoldenREF.enable ; set local map blockers CG02HiddenPlaneREF.enable CG03HiddenPlaneREF.enable CG04HiddenPlaneREF.disable ; change radio to scripted broadcast RadioVault101REF.enable RadioVault101REF.SetBroadcastState 0 set CG04.RadioTimer to CG04BroadcastTimer ; lock door to vault exit Vault101ExitDoor.Lock 255 ; lock dad's terminal CG04DadsTerminalREF.lock 255 ; set up player DisablePlayerControls 1 1 1 1 0 0 1 player.ResetHealth SetPCYoung 0 ; player should now be back to normal set CG04.timer to 1 set CG04.runTimer to 1 playBink "3 years later.bik" 0 0 1 0; don't interrupt, don't mute audio CG04AmataREF.moveto CG04AmataStartMarker player.moveto cg04playerstartmarker set TTBDialogue.CG04TrapAmanda to 1 ttbamandaref.moveto ttbCG04AmandaTrappedREF
; set start time so you come out during the day set gamehour to 6 set gameyear to 2277 set gamemonth to 7 set gameday to 17 set gamedayspassed to 5.25 ; Friday, 6 am
; only necessary if quickstarting CG04 player.additem vaultsuit101 1 1

; play animation CG04AmataREF.evp player.addscriptpackage CG04PlayerSection0 ; run timer for "wake up" animation set CG04.runTimer to 1 set CG04.timer to 6.3 ; make sure vault suit is equipped player.equipitem vaultsuit101 0 1 player.equipitem pipboy 0 1
; wake up animation done set CG04.runTimer to 0 player.RemoveScriptPackage ; get Amata to force-greet CG04AmataREF.evp ;autosave
; player has talked to Amata EnablePlayerControls
setobjectivedisplayed CG04 5 1
; Amata gives the player the pistol CG04AmataREF.removeitem weap10mmPistol 1 CG04AmataREF.removeitem ammo10mm 10 ; remove it all player.additem weap10mmPistol 1 player.additem ammo10mm 36
Enter the Overseer's office.
ESP.TRADUIT: Entra en la oficina del supervisor.

ESP.ORIGINAL: setObjectiveCompleted CG04 5 1 setObjectiveDisplayed CG04 10 1 player.additem lockpick 10 ; tutorial picking things up setstage CGTutorial 80
; player has exited his apartment CG04RadroachAmbushAREF.enable ; display sneak tutorial setstage CGTutorial 90
; security guard has killed all the radroaches player.addToFaction Vault101SecurityEnemyFaction 0 CG04Vault101Security02REF.evp

; player has hit Butch trigger zone CG04ButchRadroachREF.enable ; restrain Ellen CG04EllenDeloriaREF.setrestrained 1 ; make player an enemy of guards player.addToFaction Vault101SecurityEnemyFaction 0 ; make player an ally of Ellen faction (so she doesn't mind you hitting her) SetAlly CG04EllenFaction PlayerFaction ; make Butch friend of player (for combat purposes) SetAlly CG04ButchFamilyFaction PlayerFaction 1 1
; Butch has spoken to player
; player has agreed to save Butch's mom set CG04ButchREF.doTalk to 0 ; make Butch stop yelling for guard set CG04.ButchFriend to 1 set CG04.ButchEnemy to 0
; player convinces Butch to save mom himself CG04ButchRef.setav aggression 1 set CG04ButchREF.doTalk to 0 ; make Butch stop yelling for guard set CG04.ButchFriend to 1 set CG04.ButchEnemy to 0
; player says he won't help set CG04ButchREF.doTalk to 1 set CG04ButchREF.timer to 3 set CG04.ButchFriend to 0 set CG04.ButchEnemy to 1
; player makes Butch run away set CG04ButchREF.doTalk to 0 ; make Butch stop yelling for guard set CG04.ButchFriend to 0 set CG04.ButchEnemy to 1

;Butch's mom is saved from the roaches RewardKarma 100 CG04ButchREF.evp ; make sure Butch stops yelling for the guard set CG04ButchREF.doTalk to 0 ; unrestrain mom CG04EllenDeloriaREF.setRestrained 0 CG04EllenDeloriaREF.evp CG04EllenDeloriaREF.setav confidence 0 ; make her neutral to player SetEnemy CG04EllenFaction PlayerFaction 1 1 ; make Butch help mom from now on CG04ButchREF.setav assistance 2 CG04ButchREF.setav aggression 1
; Butch's mom is dead

; move Amata to Overseer's office when player enters Vault101b CG04AmataRef.moveto CG04InterrogationAmataMarker ; Pip-Boy light tutorial setstage CGTutorial 100 ; trigger Atrium conversation CG04MaryHoldenREF.evp
; trigger interrogation scene CG04AmataREF.evp ; make sure door is closed CG04SecurityCenterDoor.setOpenState 0
setObjectiveCompleted CG04 5 1 ; in case I never talked to Amata setObjectiveDisplayed CG04 10 1
; start interrogation looping scene set CG04.InterrogationStage to 4 ; overseer tells Mack to hit her

; If she has the pistol, she equips it now and pulls it out CG04AmataREF.equipItem weap10mmPistol 1 CG04AmataREF.setalert 1 CG04AmataREF.look CG04Vault101Security03REF 1 ; rotate to Mack ; start interrogation scene set CG04.InterrogationStage to 0 ; special version of scene where she has pistol ; Officer Mack shouts a warning CG04Vault101Security03REF.sayTo CG04OverseerREF CG04SecurityBarks

; interrogation scene done set CG04.InterrogationStage to 0 CG04AmataRef.setalert 0 CG04AmataRef.stoplook CG04AmataREF.evp CG04OverseerREF.evp if CG04Vault101Security03REF.getDetected player > 0 CG04Vault101Security03REF.say CG04SecurityBarks endif ; player somehow interrupted interrogation if CG04.AmataAction == 0 set CG04.AmataAction to 1 endif
; player has spoken to Overseer or killed him CG04AmataREF.evp
set CG04WeaponCount to player.GetItemCount weapBaseballBat player.removeitem weapBaseballBat CG04WeaponCount CG04OverseerREF.additemHealthPercent weapBaseballBat CG04WeaponCount .5
set CG04WeaponCount to player.GetItemCount weapPoliceBaton player.removeitem weapPoliceBaton CG04WeaponCount CG04OverseerREF.additemHealthPercent weapPoliceBaton CG04WeaponCount .25

set CG04WeaponCount to player.GetItemCount weapBBGun player.removeitem weapBBGun CG04WeaponCount CG04OverseerREF.additemHealthPercent weapBBGun CG04WeaponCount .4 ; ammo too set CG04WeaponCount to player.GetItemCount ammoBB player.removeitem ammoBB CG04WeaponCount CG04OverseerREF.additem ammoBB CG04WeaponCount

; give pistol(s) to Overseer set CG04WeaponCount to player.GetItemCount weap10mmPistol player.removeitem weap10mmPistol CG04WeaponCount CG04OverseerREF.additemHealthPercent weap10mmPistol CG04WeaponCount .25 ; give ammo set CG04WeaponCount to player.GetItemCount ammo10mm player.removeitem ammo10mm CG04WeaponCount CG04OverseerREF.additem ammo10mm CG04WeaponCount
; player has spoken to Amata during/after interrogation scene setstage CG04 38 ; make sure interrogation scene ends now

; if Amata still has the gun, she gives it to you now CG04AmataREF.removeitem weap10mmPistol 1 CG04AmataREF.removeitem ammo10mm 10 ; remove it all player.additemHealthPercent weap10mmPistol 1 .9 player.additem ammo10mm 30
Use the Overseer's computer to access the secret tunnel.
ESP.TRADUIT: Usa el ordenador del supervisor para acceder al túnel secreto.

Enter the reactor room.
ESP.TRADUIT: Entra en la sala del reactor.

Turn the power back on.
ESP.TRADUIT: Vuelve a activar la corriente.

ESP.ORIGINAL: setObjectiveCompleted CG04 50 1 setObjectiveDisplayed CG04 60 1 ; clean up if this is still going: set CG04.OverseerCallForHelp to 0
Player flips first reactor switch -- guards react

; unlock main door to reactor level ;Vault101dDoorToE.unlock ; guard runs in to see what's going on if CG04Vault101Security05REF.getDead == 0 CG04Vault101Security05REF.moveto CG04ReactorGuardStartMarker CG04Vault101Security05REF.addscriptpackage CG04GuardRunIntoReactorRoom elseif CG04Vault101Security01REF.getDead == 0 CG04Vault101Security01REF.moveto CG04ReactorGuardStartMarker CG04Vault101Security01REF.addscriptpackage CG04GuardRunIntoReactorRoom elseif CG04Vault101Security02REF.getDead == 0 CG04Vault101Security02REF.moveto CG04ReactorGuardStartMarker CG04Vault101Security02REF.addscriptpackage CG04GuardRunIntoReactorRoom elseif CG04Vault101Security03REF.getDead == 0 CG04Vault101Security03REF.moveto CG04ReactorGuardStartMarker CG04Vault101Security03REF.addscriptpackage CG04GuardRunIntoReactorRoom endif
Open the vault door.
ESP.TRADUIT: Abre la puerta del refugio.

ESP.ORIGINAL: setObjectiveCompleted CG04 40 1 setObjectiveCompleted CG04 60 1 setObjectiveDisplayed CG04 70 1 ; in case Amata scene never finished CG04AmataRef.setalert 0 ; turn the lights back on ;Vault101RedLightsREF.disable ;Vault101RegularLightsREF.enable ;Vault101BackupGeneratorLightsREF.disable
Escape from Vault 101.
ESP.TRADUIT: Escapa del Refugio 101.

ESP.ORIGINAL: setObjectiveCompleted CG04 70 1 setObjectiveDisplayed CG04 80 1 ; run timer for guard yells set CG04.runTimer to 1 set CG04.timer to 2 CG04Vault101Security07Ref.enable CG04Vault101Security08Ref.enable
; run timer for Amata scene set CG04.runTimer to 1 set CG04.timer to .5 CG04Vault101Security07Ref.say CG04SecurityBarks 1
; trigger Amata scene CG04AmataREF.moveto CG04AmataAtVaultDoorMarker CG04AmataREF.evp ; make sure secret door is open CG04SecretDoorREF.setopenstate 1 ; turn off timer set CG04.runTimer to 0
; Vault door has finished opening, trigger Amata force-greet CG04AmataREF.evp

; player has spoken to Amata ; unlock door to vault exit (so guards can come in) Vault101ExitDoor.Unlock CG04Vault101AtriumToEntrance.Unlock ; make guards aggressive so they attack CG04Vault101Security07Ref.setav aggression 1 CG04Vault101Security08Ref.setav aggression 1

; player has finished changing his character and exited the final vault door ; turn back on normal range of load screens SetLocationSpecificLoadScreensOnly 0 set CG04.runTimer to 1 set CG04.timer to 15

completeAllObjectives CG04 rewardXP 200 ;enable MS16 now that the player has left the vault. startQuest MS16 set RadioGalaxyNewsQuest.CG04Done to ( GameDaysPassed + 1 ) ; turn back on normal range of load screens SetLocationSpecificLoadScreensOnly 0 SetInCharGen 0 ; now you can level up addachievement 3 stopQuest CG04 ; start MQ01 setstage MQ01 10
; turn off CG04 actors CG04ActorMarker.disable CG04AllenMackREF.disable CG04TomHoldenREF.disable CG04MaryHoldenREF.disable CG04StanleyREF.disable
Talk to Amata about her plan to escape the Vault.
ESP.TRADUIT: Hablar con Amata sobre su plan para huir del refugio.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Enter the Overseer's office.
ESP.TRADUIT: Entrar en la oficina del supervisor.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Enter the reactor control room.
ESP.TRADUIT: Entrar en la sala de control del reactor.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Turn the power back on.
ESP.TRADUIT: Conectar la energía.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Open the Vault door.
ESP.TRADUIT: Abrir la puerta del refugio.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Use the Overseer's computer to access the secret tunnel.
ESP.TRADUIT: Usar el ordenador del supervisor para acceder el túnel secreto.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Escape the Vault.
ESP.TRADUIT: Escapar del refugio.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Finding the Garden of Eden
ESP.TRADUIT: En busca del Jardín del Edén

ESP.ORIGINAL: Locate the underground entrance to Vault 87
ESP.TRADUIT: Localiza la entrada subterránea al Refugio 87.

ESP.ORIGINAL: SetObjectiveDisplayed MQ08 10 1

ESP.TRADUIT: Recupera el G.E.C.K.

ESP.TRADUIT: Rescata a Fawkes de las celdas de observación (opcional).

ESP.TRADUIT: Escapa del Refugio 87.

;Set Moira to enter this new data ;set MS03.MoiraDataEntry to 1 ;MoiraBrownREF.evp
;Add player reward player.addItem MS03a1FoodReward 1
;Finish "return" objective and clear others SetObjectiveDisplayed MS03 12 0 SetObjectiveCompleted MS03 16 1

;Track current book style: if (MS03.standard > MS03.smart && MS03.standard > MS03.tough && MS03.standard > MS03.sly && MS03.standard > MS03.snide) Set MS03.currentStyle to 0 elseif (MS03.smart > MS03.standard && MS03.smart > MS03.tough && MS03.smart > MS03.sly && MS03.smart > MS03.snide) Set MS03.currentStyle to 1 elseif (MS03.tough > MS03.smart && MS03.tough > MS03.standard && MS03.tough > MS03.sly && MS03.tough > MS03.snide) Set MS03.currentStyle to 2 elseif (MS03.sly > MS03.smart && MS03.sly > MS03.tough && MS03.sly > MS03.standard && MS03.sly > MS03.snide) Set MS03.currentStyle to 3 elseif (MS03.snide > MS03.smart && MS03.snide > MS03.tough && MS03.snide > MS03.sly && MS03.snide > MS03.standard) Set MS03.currentStyle to 4 else Set MS03.currentStyle to 0 endif

endif

addachievement 16
The Wasteland Survival Guide has been researched and spread throughout the Capitol Wasteland, where it will help countless survivors.
ESP.TRADUIT: Se ha investigado y difundido la Guía de supervivencia del Yermo por toda Yermo Capital; allí servirá de ayuda a innumerables supervivientes.

addachievement 16
Ask Moira Brown about her book.
ESP.TRADUIT: Preguntar a Moira Brown sobre su libro.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Help Moira with Chapter 1.
ESP.TRADUIT: Ayudar a Moira con el capítulo 1.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Find food in the Super-Duper Mart.
ESP.TRADUIT: Encontrar comida en las Tiendas Superguay.

ESP.ORIGINAL: (Optional) Find medicine in the Super-Duper Mart.
ESP.TRADUIT: (Opcional) Encontrar medicina en las Tiendas Superguay.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Return to Moira.
ESP.TRADUIT: Volver a Moira.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Contract radiation sickness (200 rads).
ESP.TRADUIT: Contraer malestar por radiación (200 rads).

ESP.ORIGINAL: (Optional) Contract more severe radiation sickness (600 rads).
ESP.TRADUIT: (Opcional) Contraer malestar por radiación más grave (600 rads).

ESP.ORIGINAL: Return to Moira.
ESP.TRADUIT: Volver a Moira.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Travel to the playground in Minefield.
ESP.TRADUIT: Viajar al parque infantil de Minefield.

ESP.ORIGINAL: (Optional) Bring a landmine to Moira.
ESP.TRADUIT: (Opcional) Llevar una mina de tierra a Moira.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Return to Moira.
ESP.TRADUIT: Volver a Moira.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Help Moira with Chapter 2.
ESP.TRADUIT: Ayudar a Moira con el capítulo 2.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Test the repellent on three Mole Rats.
ESP.TRADUIT: Probar el repelente en las ratas topo.

ESP.ORIGINAL: (Optional) Test the repellent on seven more Mole Rats.
ESP.TRADUIT: (Opcional) Probar el repelente en siete ratas topo más.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Return to Moira.
ESP.TRADUIT: Volver a Moira.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Place the observer in a spawning pod in the Anchorage War Memorial.
ESP.TRADUIT: Colocar el observador en una cápsula ovígera en el Anchorage War Memorial.

ESP.ORIGINAL: (Optional) Do not kill any Mirelurks in the Anchorage War Memorial.
ESP.TRADUIT: (Opcional) No mates ningún hombre pinza en el Anchorage War Memorial.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Return to Moira.
ESP.TRADUIT: Volver a Moira.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Become seriously injured (50% health or less).
ESP.TRADUIT: Estar seriamente herido (50% de salud o menos).

ESP.ORIGINAL: (Optional) Receive a crippling injury.
ESP.TRADUIT: (Opcional) Sufrir una lesión en una parte del cuerpo.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Return to Moira with your injuries.
ESP.TRADUIT: Volver a Moira con las heridas.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Help Moira with the last chapter.
ESP.TRADUIT: Ayudar a Moira con el último capítulo.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Learn the history of Rivet City.
ESP.TRADUIT: Aprender la historia de Rivet City.

ESP.ORIGINAL: (Optional) Check other sources to confirm Rivet City's history.
ESP.TRADUIT: (Opcional) Comprobar otras fuentes para confirmar la historia de Rivet City.

ESP.ORIGINAL: (Optional) Uncover Rivet City's true history.
ESP.TRADUIT: (Opcional) Descubrir la verdadera historia de Rivet City.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Return to Moira.
ESP.TRADUIT: Volver a Moira.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Install the processor widget in the RobCo production facility mainframe.
ESP.TRADUIT: Instalar el artilugio del procesador en la unidad central de las instalaciones de producción de RobCo.

ESP.ORIGINAL: (Optional) Reprogram the RobCo facility mainframe.
ESP.TRADUIT: (Opcional) Reprogramar la unidad central de las instalaciones de RobCo.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Return to Moira.
ESP.TRADUIT: Volver a Moira.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Access the card catalogue in Arlington Public Library.
ESP.TRADUIT: Acceder al catálogo de tarjetas de la Biblioteca Pública de Arlington.

ESP.ORIGINAL: (Optional) Retrieve complete library archives.
ESP.TRADUIT: (Opcional) Recuperar los archivos completos de la biblioteca.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Return to Moira.
ESP.TRADUIT: Volver a Moira.

ESP.ORIGINAL: SetLocationSpecificLoadScreensOnly 1 SetInCharGen 1 ; no leveling during chargen CG00DadREF.moveto CG00DadStartMarker CG00DoctorLiREF.moveto CG00DoctorLiStartMarker CG00MomREF.moveto CG00MomStartMarker setstage CG00 5 player.moveto CG00PlayerStartMarker
set CG00.timer to .01 set CG00.runTimer to 1 disableplayercontrols 1 1 1 1 1 imod CG00BlackScreenISFX player.addscriptpackage CG00PlayerSection0
; we've loaded in -- play sound and run timer playSound QSTBirthStart set CG00.timer to 10 set CG00.runTimer to 1

; begin animations CG00DadREF.evp CG00MomREF.evp CG00DoctorLiREF.evp ;imod FadeInFromWhiteISFX imod CG00BirthISFX imod CG00BirthBaseISFX player.addscriptpackage CG00PlayerSection0 set CG00.timer to 2 set CG00.runTimer to 1 TriggerScreenBlood 10 ; add baby crying sound playSound QSTBabyCry
set CG00.timer to 7.5 ; + 2 from stage 8 = 9.5 seconds total SetNoActivationSound QSTBabyCry ; cry on activation failure
; Dad starts talking set CG00DadREF.doTalk to 1 set CG00DadREF.timer to 0 ; for now to synch with animation player.addScriptPackage CG00PlayerSection1
set CG00DadREF.doTalk to 0 ; run timer to choose sex set CG00.runTimer to 1 set CG00.timer to 1
; player chooses gender player.addScriptPackage CG00PlayerSection2 ; run timer before starting dialogue again set CG00.runTimer to 1 set CG00.timer to 1
set CG00.runTimer to 0 ; dad starts speaking again set CG00DadREF.doTalk to 1
set CG00DadREF.doTalk to 0 ; run timer to choose name set CG00.runTimer to 1 set CG00.timer to 1
; player chooses name GetPlayerName player.addScriptPackage CG00PlayerSection3 ; run timer before starting dialogue again set CG00.runTimer to 1 set CG00.timer to 1
set CG00.runTimer to 0 ; dad starts speaking again set CG00DadREF.doTalk to 1
; player chooses face/body ShowRaceMenu set CG00.runTimer to 1
; set when player enters menu mode
; set when player exits menu mode player.addScriptPackage CG00PlayerSection4

; dad matches player's race and face CG01DadREF.MatchRace player CG02DadREF.MatchRace player CG03DadREF.MatchRace player MQDadREF.MatchRace player ; match face CG01DadREF.MatchFaceGeometry player CGMatchFace CG02DadREF.MatchFaceGeometry player CGMatchFace CG03DadREF.MatchFaceGeometry player CGMatchFace MQDadREF.MatchFaceGeometry player CGMatchFace

player.addScriptPackage CG00PlayerSection5 ; Both start talking in this section set CG00DadREF.doTalk to 1 set CG00MomREF.doTalk to 1 ; try evp-ing everybody to synch animations better CG00DadREF.evp CG00MomREF.evp CG00DoctorLiREF.evp ; enable next Dad CG01DadRef.enable
; beginning of emergency
set CG00.timer to 2.2 set CG00.runTimer to 1 imod FadeToWhiteAndBackISFX playSound QSTFadeToWhiteA

player.removescriptpackage set CG00MomREF.doTalk to 0 set CG00DadREF.doTalk to 0 rimod CG00BirthBaseISFX CG00DadREF.disable stopQuest CG00 ; set this now to avoid double 3D reset in CG02 SetPCYoung 1 ; default hair ; do this last as it contains player.moveto: setstage CG01 0
The Power of the Atom
ESP.TRADUIT: El poder del átomo

if WalterRef.GetInCell Megaton || WalterRef.GetInWorldSpace MegatonWorld WalterRef.Kill endif
WaterBeggar01Ref.kill WaterBeggar01Ref.disable

completeAllObjectives MS11
;Get Burke Reward rewardxp 300
if MS11.BurkeBonus >= 1 player.additem caps001 1000 else player.additem caps001 500 endif
player.additem TenpennySuiteKey 1 player.additem HouseDeedTenpenny 1 Set RadioGalaxyNewsQuest.MS11Clear to ( GameDaysPassed + 1 ) Set RadioGalaxyNewsQuest.ExploitReady to 1 set MS11.BlowUp to 4 ;TenpennyPlayerDoorRef.Enable ;TenpennyUnocSuiteDoorRef.Disable setStage MSObjectives 11 ;handles making sure the correct objectives / fail messages show up stopQuest MS11 addachievement 23

completeAllObjectives MS11
;Get Simms Reward rewardxp 300 Set RadioGalaxyNewsQuest.MS11Clear to ( GameDaysPassed + 1 ) Set RadioGalaxyNewsQuest.ExploitReady to 1 if MS11.SimmsBonus == 1 player.additem caps001 100 elseif MS11.SimmsBonus == 2 player.additem caps001 500 endif
player.AddItem MegatonHouseKey 1 player.AddItem HouseDeedMegaton 1 LucasSimmsRef.modDisposition player 75 stopQuest MS11
;make Burke disappear if MisterBurkeRef.getInSameCell player == 0 MisterBurkeRef.disable set MS11Fin.moved to 1 endif
addachievement 23
;FAIL
Disarm Megaton's atomic bomb.
ESP.TRADUIT: Desactivar la bomba atómica de Megatón.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Rig Megaton's atomic bomb to explode.
ESP.TRADUIT: Hacer explotar la bomba atómica de Megatón.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Report to Lucas Simms in Megaton.
ESP.TRADUIT: Ir a ver a Lucas Simms en Megatón.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Report to Mister Burke in Tenpenny Tower.
ESP.TRADUIT: Ir a ver a Mister Burke en Tenpenny Tower.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Activate the detonator at Tenpenny Tower.
ESP.TRADUIT: Activar el detonador en Tenpenny Tower.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Receive reward from Mister Burke in Tenpenny Tower.
ESP.TRADUIT: Recibir recompensa de Mister Burke en Tenpenny Tower.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Disarm Megaton's atomic bomb... or rig it to explode.
ESP.TRADUIT: Desactivar la bomba atómica de Megatón... o hacer que explote.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Report to Lucas Simms' son, Harden, in Megaton.
ESP.TRADUIT: Ir a ver al hijo de Lucas Simms, Harden, en Megatón.

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Optional] Ask Leo Stahl at the Brass Lantern about buying Mentats.
ESP.TRADUIT: [Opcional] Preguntar a Leo Stahl en El farol de latón sobre comprar Mentats para mejorar la habilidad Explosivos.

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Optional] Meet Leo Stahl at the water treatment plant for Mentats .
ESP.TRADUIT: [Opcional] Reunirse con Leo Stahl en la planta de tratamiento de agua para mejorar la habilidad Explosivos con Mentats.

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Optional] Loot Leo Stahl's stash at the water treatment plant for Mentats.
ESP.TRADUIT: [Opcional] Saquear el escondite de Leo Stahl en la planta de tratamiento de agua para mejorar la habilidad Explosivos con Mentats.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ties That Bind Dialogue
Keepsake
ESP.TRADUIT: Recuerdo

ESP.ORIGINAL: Your mother's necklace is a continual reminder of what you've lost, but also what you're fighting for. Your strength and endurance are each increased by one.
ESP.TRADUIT: El colgante de tu madre es un recuerdo constante de lo que has perdido, pero también de por qué luchas. Tu fuerza y tu resistencia aumentan un punto.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Closure
ESP.TRADUIT: Pasando página

ESP.ORIGINAL: You've come a long way, from the naive Vault dweller, searching for the truth and you feel like for the first time you can focus. Your Perception has increased by one.
ESP.TRADUIT: Has recorrido un largo camino, desde que eras solo un ingenuo morador del Refugio buscando la verdad, y sientes que por primera vez te puedes centrar. Tu Percepción aumenta un punto.

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're going to need the key to Amanda's slave collar before you unlock the cage.
ESP.TRADUIT: Necesitarás la llave del collar de esclava de Amanda antes de forzar la puerta de la jaula.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Need Key
ESP.TRADUIT: Necesitas la llave

ESP.ORIGINAL: The manifest indicates that the crate contains the body of a male scientist, recovered from an irradiated chamber in the Jefferson Memorial Rotunda.
ESP.TRADUIT: El albarán indica que el contenedor contiene el cuerpo de un científico varón, recuperado de una cámara irradiada en la Rotonda del Jefferson Memorial.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Recover Dad's body.
ESP.TRADUIT: Recuperar el cuerpo de papá.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Leave it alone.
ESP.TRADUIT: Dejarlo ahí.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Looking around, the old shack is the answer to everything - and nothing. A vault, an aircraft carrier, four walls in the middle of nowhere: they're all just things, structures, places...
ESP.TRADUIT: Mirando alrededor ves que la vieja cabaña es la respuesta a todo... y a nada. Un refugio, un portaaviones, cuatro paredes en mitad de la nada: son solo cosas, estructuras, lugares...

ESP.ORIGINAL: Closure
ESP.TRADUIT: Pasando página

ESP.ORIGINAL: Leave Mr. Patches
ESP.TRADUIT: Dejar al Señor Parches

ESP.ORIGINAL: Keep him
ESP.TRADUIT: Quedártelo

ESP.ORIGINAL: Perk added: Closure
ESP.TRADUIT: Extra añadido: Pasando página

ESP.ORIGINAL: Closure
ESP.TRADUIT: Pasando página

ESP.TRADUIT: Extra añadido: Recuerdo

ESP.TRADUIT: Recuerdo
